---
title: Presentation order
date: 'December 18, 2018'
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include = F}
library(tidyverse)
library(glue)
set.seed(10848)

presentation_dir <- 'Presentations2019B'
presentation_files <- file.path(presentation_dir,list.files(presentation_dir))
presentation_names <- list.files(presentation_dir)

tbl <- tibble('Files' = as.character(glue('- [{presentation_names}]({presentation_files}){{target="_blank"}}'))) %>% 
  mutate("Names" = c('Rama Atitkar','Alexander Bell','Alexander Chassiakos','Marie Cronin','Larissa Erben','Neha Gupta','Sunhyun Lee','Hai Liang',"Allison O'Connell", 'optionals','Samantha Papal','Catherine Jaeger','Akshay Thaper','Yafeng He')) %>% 
  filter(Names != 'optionals') %>% 
  select(Names, Files)
tbl <- rbind(tbl, c('Names' = 'Jake Noeker',Files = '[- presentation](http://rpubs.com/jnoek24/452152){target="_blank"}'))
tbl_ordered <- tbl[sample(1:nrow(tbl)),]
```

## Presentations

```{r, echo = F}
knitr::kable(tbl_ordered)
```
